participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Sociable and nurturing, Emma finds joy in connecting with others and helping those in need.
participant_1.background: I do my laundry when I run out of clean clothes. I collect stray people like crazy cat ladies collect cats. I am not close with my family, but I am close to my friends and the people I volunteer with. I always seem to be losing things, most recently, my mind. My parents are my heroes.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Michael is adventurous and caring, always seeking to make the most out of life while ensuring those around him feel valued and supported.
participant_2.background: My fondest childhood memories are of playing outside with my friends in the summer. I moved to America when I was 14. I'm healthy because I'm responsible with my diet and I get enough sleep. I live in a rural community. I love starting my day with a swim.

content.text: Hey, what's your favorite thing to do?
I love starting my day with a swim, it's so refreshing! What about you?
I like to collect stray people, like the crazy cat ladys collect cats. It's so much fun to make new friends!
That's really cool! I'm not very close with my family, but I'm close to my friends and the people I volunteer with. Do you have any siblings?
I do, but I'm not close with them either. I moved to America when I was 14 and they all stayed in the UK.
Oh that must have been hard! I'm glad you have a good support system here in America. What do you do for work?
I'm a volunteer at the local animal shelter. I love animals and I like helping out.
That's really great! I'm sure the animals love you there. I'm a nurse, I work at the hospital.
Oh that's really cool! I've always been fascinated by medicine, but I'm not very good with blood.
That's okay! There are lots of different jobs in the medical field, you just have to find the one that's right for you.
Yeah, I'm still looking. But I'm happy volunteering at the animal shelter for now.
That's great! It's important to find something you're passionate about.
